title: Since installing the incredibly irritating Android 11 Pixel Ambient Services has stopped working.
content:
Pixel Ambient Services requires only one permission: microphone. But the app is not requesting any permissions. Thus, it is now useless. I'm a Google One subscriber, and when I contacted them their only suggestion was the vas overkill of resetting my phone to factory settings. 

This is only one of several problems that I simply cannot fix that got introduced by the "upgrade" to Android 11.
